_header: He that casteth off the old / Before he know the new
_description: ‘Alle olde things ar not ill’ — two quatrains

BlCottGalEIX.Transcription:
Hhe that casteth of the oldeBe fore he know the neweMaye weepe
                    in the winterWhen frostes dooth insweAll olde thinges ar not
                    illWhere wisemen doo weueSom newe thinges ar scharce goodand that
                    is trwe
BlCottGalEIX.Note:
Added by a sixteenth-century hand to originally blank remainder of
                    column.
BlCottGalEIX.Editions:
Hulme,  William Henry,
                        ed.  
             The Harrowing of Hell and Gospel of Nicodemus.
EETS
         e.s. 100 (1908); repr. 1976: xxv.
